text:
@shannonrwatts @MarciaBunney For years it was said Putin helped Trump win the Presidency. 
It was said Putin wanted America weakened. 

It makes no sense how horrific Trump is running the govt during #COVID19

Is it intentional?

entity.name: Trump says he discussed Venezuela and the Mueller report with Putin in an hour-long call
entity.description: President Trump confirmed the call in a series of Tweets on Friday, adding that the political turmoil in Venezuela was also a subject of a phone conversation with Russia's Vladimir Putin. Referring to the report's conclusion that Russia interfered in the 2016 election while clearing the Trump campaign of conspiracy, Trump said he and Putin discussed the "Russia Hoax."

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
